actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend to February 15 the date for filing the 4th installment of estimated tax for individuals, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend from January 31 to February 15 the date for filing the fourth installment of estimated tax for individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend to February 15 the date for filing the 4th installment of estimated tax for individuals, and for other purposes.
